lang.NewPwdMustDef: A new password must be entered !
lang.PleaseStartAgain:
Program will exit.
Please start it again !
lang.AdminsDelImpossible: It is not possible to delete 'Admins' role !
lang.AdminDelImpossible: It is not possible to delete 'Admin' user !
lang.SessionExpMustLogon: The session has expired: You must log on again !
lang.NowIsPossible: Now you can retry the command !
lang.DbmsConstrViolationUpdate: It is not possible to insert/modify data due to violation of logical rules !
lang.DbmsConstrViolationDelete: It is not possible to delete data due to the existence of dependent data !
lang.FirstSheetFirst: First sheet must be filled first !
lang.TermAlreadyDefined: The term has already a value !
lang.TermAlreadyAssigned: The value is already assigned to another location !
lang.FirstSheetMustBeAccessible: The first sheet must be accessible in order to access the data dialog !
lang.ColNotSortable: Ordering by this column is not possible !
lang.LeaveAuthExit: Leaving the authentication means exiting the program: do you want to exit ?
lang.KeepAppRunning: Do you want to keep application running (not recommended) ?
lang.WantReconnect: Database connection could be lost : do you want to re-connect ?
lang.WantDelBlob: Do you really want to delete the binary object stored in the database ?
lang.WantExitApp: Do you want to exit the program ?
lang.DeletionGoingOn: All data related to the currently selected value will be deleted : do you want to continue with the selection ?
lang.WantDelCertFromTrusted: Do you really want to delete the locally stored certificate below specified ?
lang.SelfCertAllowance: The server is identified by the below specified certificate that is trusted by no local registered CA (it is a 'self trusting' certificate). Do you want to continue any way with this server ?
lang.AddCertToTrustedList: Do you want to have this certificate stored locally ?
lang.MustBeNonZero: The value cannot be zero or empty !
lang.MustBeSelectedOne: At least one value must be selected !
lang.WantToSave: The change of the context will require the saving of modified data. Do you want to continue ?
lang.NeedToSave: Data must be saved before switching data sheet !
lang.WantToDelete: Are you sure to delete this %1$s ?
lang.WantDeleteWholeDoc: Do you really want to delete the whole document ?
lang.NumberExceeding: Integer part exceeds the defined bound !
lang.BinaryEditNeedsRec: Record must exist and not be editing in order to access a binary object !
lang.InitializingRepEngineMsg: Report engine is running or initializing
lang.NotSortableInEditing: It is not possible to sort the (data) grid during editing !
lang.NotSortingInQueue: Ordering makes no sense in a queue !
lang.NoFieldToSortBy: No database field is defined on this column ! No ordering is possible.
lang.Name: Name
lang.ReqPwdChange: Require password change on first access
lang.DnldPreDialogTitle: Do you want to prefix with the dialog title ?
lang.ViewerAction1: - Ctrl T to have all opened viewers (of the field) as tiles
lang.ViewerAction2: - Ctrl R to have all opened viewers (of the field) restored to their default size and location
lang.ViewerAction4: - Mouse wheel or Ctrl +/- to zoom
lang.ViewerAction5: - Ctrl W to close all opened viewers (of the field)
lang.ViewersAsTiles: Set all opened viewers (of the field) as tiles
lang.ViewersRestore: Restore all opened viewers (of the field) to their default size and location
lang.ViewersClose: Close all opened viewers (of the field)
lang.ExtendedToAll: Do you want '%1$s' action to be applied to the entire set in the list ?
lang.AtMostXChars: For this field at most %s characters are allowed!
lang.OptionAcquired: %s has been acquired. It will take effect on the next start of the application !
lang.EditAddDetails: Double click to add or edit a details record
lang.DragUpAndDown: Click on a row and drag it up or down to change its position within the list
lang.LocaleUpdateEvent1: Success ! Users, currently connected, must re-connect to see the change.
lang.LocaleUpdateEvent2: The change made doesn't perform any conversion of the amounts filled in the application:
lang.LocaleUpdateEvent3: It is a simple change of the currency qualifier for them.
lang.DbmsUnreachable: The database server is not reachable !
lang.DbmsCreateUserFailed: The Creation of the user failed !
lang.DbmsCreateUserFailed2: May be the username already exists. Try another username !
lang.ToolTipDirectSearch: This dialog performs the research as soon as the user digits characters in the criteria fields
lang.ToolTipNextOpening: The change will be effective on the next opening of the window !
lang.ColEditable: This column is editable (click on it)
lang.NotEditableWhenShared: This form is not editable when the application is 'shared' !
lang.SelectRowToManage: Select a row to manage or see data of the inherent record
lang.ChangeStationFontSize: Change the font size on this workstation
lang.PleaseUseNavig: Please, use the navigation or the choice selection buttons !
